## University of Michigan School of Public Health
### Noninvasive encapsulated follicular variant of papillary thyroid cancer was reclassified as noninvasive follicular thyroid neoplasm with papillary-like nuclear features (NIFTP) in January 2017. The impact of this nomenclature change at a population level remains unknown. Analysis is done on different demographic groups to see which groups are most affected by this reclassification.

[Variation in the diagnosis of noninvasive follicular thyroid neoplasm with papillary-like nuclear features (NIFTP)](https://academic.oup.com/jcem/article-abstract/107/10/e4072/6653515)
